parameter.name: description
parameter.description: Plain text content of the ticket.

parameter.name: descriptionHtml
parameter.description: HTML content of the ticket. Description and description_html should not be passed together.

parameter.name: subject
parameter.description: The Ticket subject.

parameter.name: email
parameter.description: The Email address of the requester. If no contact exists with this email address in Freshdesk, it will be added as a new contact.

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: The Status of the ticket.

parameter.name: priority
parameter.description: The Priority of the ticket.

parameter.name: source
parameter.description: The The channel through which the ticket was created.

parameter.name: deleted
parameter.description: The Deleted status of the Ticket.

parameter.name: requesterId
parameter.description: User-id of the requester. For existing contacts, requester_id can be passed instead of email.

parameter.name: requesterName
parameter.description: The requesterId

parameter.name: responderId
parameter.description: ID of the agent to whom the ticket is assigned.

parameter.name: groupId
parameter.description: Id of Group to which the ticket is assigned.

parameter.name: ticketType
parameter.description: Type property field as defined in ticket fields.

parameter.name: toEmails
parameter.description: Email address to which the incoming ticket email was sent.

parameter.name: ccEmails
parameter.description: Email address added in the 'cc' field of the incoming ticket email.

parameter.name: emailConfigId
parameter.description: The Id of email config which is used for this ticket.

parameter.name: isEscalated
parameter.description: Set to true if an escalation was sent.

parameter.name: customField
parameter.description: Pre defined Custom fields as a JSON Object.

parameter.name: trained
parameter.description: Ttrained status as true or false.

parameter.name: frEscalated
parameter.description: frEscalated status as true or false.

parameter.name: delta
parameter.description: Delta as true or false.

parameter.name: urgent
parameter.description: Urgent status as true or false.

parameter.name: ownerId
parameter.description: The Owner Id.
